opennlp.ccg.ngrams
Class StandardNgramModel

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.ngrams.NgramScorer
      opennlp.ccg.ngrams.StandardNgramModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reversible, FeatureExtractor, SignScorer
Direct Known Subclasses:
SequenceScorer
public class StandardNgramModel
extends NgramScorer

A scorer for a standard n-gram backoff model. Unknown words are mapped to <unk> if the latter is present in the model.

Version:
$Revision: 1.19 $, $Date: 2011/10/11 03:29:42 $
Author:
Michael White

prepareToScoreWords

protected void prepareToScoreWords()

Overrides:
prepareToScoreWords in class NgramScorer

logProbFromNgram

protected float logProbFromNgram(int i,
                                 int order)
Returns the log prob of the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order, with backoff. (Assumes words in wordsToScore have already been converted to strings in stringsToScore, via call to prepareToScoreWords.)

Specified by:
logProbFromNgram in class NgramScorer
